description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. ZOMBIES ARE JUST REALLY STUPID, UGLY PEOPLE. YOU HATE STUPID PEOPLE. MAKE 'EM PAY FOR BEING SO STUPID... BEFORE THEY EAT YOUR BRAINS!  WELCOME TO... THE UNITED STATES OF ZOMBIELAND!!
